A UN court sentences a former government minister to life in prison for her role in the 1994 genocide in Rwanda.
In Thailand, three bomb blasts kill two and wound several others in a predominantly Muslim part of the country.
Lebanese hold an anti - Assad protest to condemn the violent crackdown in Syria.
A fierce tropical storm sweeps through northern Vietnam, killing six and damaging buildings and rice crops.
In Mexico, archaeologists in the ancient city of Palenque unveil the interior of a tomb believed to belong to a Mayan ruler.
US First Lady Michelle Obama gets a traditional welcome in Botswana.
